website_summaries.verdict: Corsair's first PC, the One Pro, is the new benchmark for small-form-factor gaming systems. It delivers high-end gaming performance of desktops twice its size, with a sleek look and a sensible price.
pros: HD and 4K gaming power of a larger desktop

customer_reviews.title: Stupid Loud
customer_reviews.text: One of the fastest, smoothest machines I have ever owned but it was so loud that I could not tolerate it. Afraid to try another one. I guess if they have to advertise how quiet it is, then you should beware.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: I really like this little guy.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little guy. It's very quiet and 4k gaming on it is great. Haven't found a VR headset that's good for bad eyes yet. It's not flashy by design so if you wanted to put it next to your TV and turn off the LED it would just be another piece of equipment. The exhaust is straight up. Thinking about porting it out the window. It doesn't heat up the room until the hard core 3d games which is nice, If you've ever had a heavy duty graphics card you'll be familiar with this. Water cooling is very effective and quiet. One whole side of this is a radiator.
customer_reviews.author: G. Feamster

customer_reviews.title: Performance even exceeded my expectations. Can be portable. ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredible Performance packed into a small lightweight footprint. May still need more ports for some believe it or not. Keeps on giving me driver problems though. Update: And barely over half a year in and it's dead. Never this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Dionisio S. Martinez II

customer_reviews.title: This is what you get when engineers design computers
customer_reviews.text: It's clear that a lot of thought went into this design. It's compact, quiet, and powerful. The actual aesthetic of the case is alright. It looks good, but I would rather have it be more understated. The only real negative thing I've noticed is that it doesn't have enough rear USB ports for all the wireless dongles I have. (Headset, mouse, keyboard, and xbox controller) The sale price was well under what a similar DIY build would come in at. I think it was a good value. Pros- Compact Quiet Powerful Good value Cons- Needs more rear USB ports.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this product. I've had this computer for about a year. It consistently doesn't turn on, there are horrible video/audio artifacts, and desyncs between audio and visuals. Consulting with Corsair, I was instructed to clear the CMOs, which I currently have to do on a regular basis, and hope that the computer turns on. Sometimes it does, sometimes it doesn't. Today, it took me about an hour to get this thing to turn on just so that I can write this review. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Gamer all my life.  Love this.
customer_reviews.text: I have certainly built a lot of custom rigs, upgraded others as they aged. This one is MUCH simpler which is good as long as you aren't looking to add a lot to it. It is lightning fast. It starts up before I can sit down and I doubt a game will challenge it any time soon. I love the bang for the buck with the machine. Oh! And it is perfectly quiet. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: This thing out of the box is perfect. As stated by other reviewers
customer_reviews.text: This thing out of the box is perfect. As stated by other reviewers, this does not come with much pre-installed, which is a nice change from the usual bundled software. It comes with pre-installers for the major game services and maintenance applications, including the expected temperature gauges for all the bells and whistles that you paid for. I've had it for a few weeks and haven't found any issues so far. Happy with my purchase. This handsome little beast looks to be built to last.
customer_reviews.author: David V.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, well integrated system
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, well integrated system; top performance. There is a low hum from the cooling pump(?) but not too noticeable. Only had it two weeks but with this nice build quality I expect it to hold up for a long while.
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: mouseA year and a half ago, the computer system was broken, and the system was reinstalled, but there was no activation code, no driver, it was a universal driver for download, and it could not be purchased anywhere until today. Can you give me the activation code and driver? I don't use the driver I downloaded online. interface often fails
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: The worst
customer_reviews.text: By far the worst experience I have ever had buying a computer. First one came and right out of the box it started crashing (BSOD) about 1 minute after every time turned it on. Called Corsair tech support and followed their instructions but no help (and no 2nd response from tech support) so I returned it and got a replacement from Amazon. Second one came and would not even make it to the windows home screen! I just kept getting a "Automatic Repair Initiated" message every time I turned it on. My last PC was a Velocity micro I bought 10(!) years ago, never had a single issue with it. Stick to quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My gamer loves this computer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer for my 10 year old for Christmas. He wants to be a YouTuber. As soon as he started using it, he would keep running in to tell me how much better it was than his other computer. His other computer wasn't a bad one either but this Corsair One blows it out of the water. Faster downloading, no game glitching, more storage space, etc. It's a great computer for a gamer.
customer_reviews.author: Tina B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and Very Powerful
customer_reviews.text: So this is the easiest Windows PC I have ever unboxed and setup. Its's straight forward and Corsair does a great job of avoiding bloatware and giving you the tools you need to maximize system performance. Within 45 minutes of opening the box, everything was updated and ready to run Overwatch and other AAA game titles on Extreme/Ultra settings. I would definitely recommend this pre-built PC for those trying to avoid the ridiculously broken GPU market owing to crypto-mining.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey West

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with this purchase. I have not had any problems whatsoever, and it runs beautifully with all of my games and applications.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Impressive spec
customer_reviews.text: Cannot build this spec for the price. Small footprint means this lives on my desk beside the monitor. Solid materials, incredibly quiet, great looking and boots up stupid fast. Use this for graphics-intensive CAD and it absolutely cruises. I expect to have this for a while before needing to upgrade. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Beam

customer_reviews.title: Best PC I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I have been building my own PCs since MS DOS 6.22 and the i386 was the latest and greatest. After purchasing the CORSAIR ONE PRO I think I will no long build another PC. The PRO ONE is very nicely configured. There are few add on apps, power saver configured correctly, and very fast gaming. I am also impressed with the case sturdiness, quality, fit and finish.
customer_reviews.author: btu44

customer_reviews.title: A pricey but great gaming pc.
customer_reviews.text: A very fast and quiet gaming pc. A bit pricey, but in my opinion it was worth it. It has very little bloatware and can handle anything I throw at it in 1440p.
customer_reviews.author: Ian M. O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Love the performance
customer_reviews.text: Love the performance, size and sharp look. Running XPlane 10 and 11requires a lot of power, and the Pro does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Birkett

customer_reviews.title: What an awesome machine. ten minutes out of the box
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome machine. ten minutes out of the box, the system was up and running. I was amazed at how fast it booted up. There was absolutely no noise which was so refreshing after the constant fan noise from my previous system. My wife and I are avid gamers, The only problem I have is that I now need to get her one of these beasts. I am exceptionally happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kiroto

customer_reviews.title: Compact & Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I love the compact form factor and the whisper quiet fan even at load. Ive switchde over to it exclusively over my main ATX rig. The performance for me is rock solid. No real reason to overclock CPU. I did overclock the GPU, but only to see if the temperatures changed drastically, but max GPU temp has been 60C. I know people say they can build something for cheaper, but it won't look or sound like this.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Dublin

customer_reviews.title: Blazing Fast
customer_reviews.text: The machine (hardware) is amazing. The only criticism I have is that they have PC Doctor installed on the machine which installed the wrong WiFi driver update. Their online help service was very good and they eventually corrected the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Bertelle

customer_reviews.title: so far so good this pc has been great
customer_reviews.text: so far so good this pc has been great. no problems setting up or getting things installed, never has crashed or had any kind of issue. boots up extremely fast, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: ghost0fthesun

customer_reviews.title: Portability and style :3
customer_reviews.text: I must note I waited for that I waited for later production models to come out to work out the first run kinks. I am extremely satisfied with this unit, the build quality is amazing and holds up to the abuse of being in a semi. I also would like to say the box makes for a nice storage and carrying case when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett B. Carbaugh

customer_reviews.title: A beast inside a slick design but with a buggy corsairlink app
customer_reviews.text: Truely this is the one! I really like the slick design without compromising the performance. I notice that corsairlink4 is buggy, based on the windows reliability monitor it stops working on every startup, the 2 light blue led lights blinks after the windows log in. I hope an update will fix the issue soon.
customer_reviews.author: Ghost

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars Unachievable with Current Fan Noise
customer_reviews.text: Four stars are populated, instead of five, because modestly reduced video settings for games doesn't negate an idle leafblower sound from the box. Aka the system is either working way too hard to run games and the fan is screaming like a banshee, I've got a lemon or the fan is stupidly loud under "modest" load. 4k gaming without jet engine sounds and stuttering gameplay, at times, seems like a pipe dream. Otherwise, this system is slick and capable.
customer_reviews.author: Parry

customer_reviews.title: SMALL SUPER POWERED PC
customer_reviews.text: It's small compact and powerful. My VR and MR systems work perfectly. It's handles work and fun flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: One beautiful gaming computer
customer_reviews.text: One beautiful gaming computer. Quality is second to none. Customer service at Corsair is in the Stone Age. Asked to have a call back , waited two weeks still no call back. Tried to register the computer, was told to just keep the receipt from amazon. Feeling a little uncomfortable as to the warranty being honored. Will wait and see.
customer_reviews.author: timothy r martin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this corsair one pro with gtx1080ti so much! It's really a very good prebulid gaming pc!
customer_reviews.author: Huayangguo

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: This is a great computer! Excellent speed, boot up, memory. Multiple port access both USB HDMI and Display Port. Have not found a game this doesnt run excellently 6 months after purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jared D. Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly compact gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: No problems with it. Put liquid metal on the CPU and replaced the exhaust fan with a Noctua and it runs cool as hell. Not that you even needed to do either of those things for the PC to be awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Bensen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Powerful compact and quite. What’s not to like about this unit? Wish it came with keyboard and mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Kuo

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, faulty microphone jack.
customer_reviews.text: Quiet. Fast. Smaller than your average desktop. My only complaint is that the microphone input doesn't work. I've tried with two different headphone sets, and both work sound, but not the microphone. I've tried splitters. The only way around it is USB headphones. Sigh.
customer_reviews.author: L. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Runs like a dream but two small gripes one they are ...
customer_reviews.text: Runs like a dream but two small gripes one they are using a slow rpm hdd a 5500 rpm and two for the sake of noise the pc runs hotter than normal but still well within spec. However it is still a top notch pc that deserves 5 stars or really like 4.75 stars
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Fanego

customer_reviews.title: A great high end gaming computer for the price
customer_reviews.text: A great high end gaming computer for the price. Compact, quiet, and fast! My only complaint is a lack of resource management software (to tune up or down performance based on task) and a slight ozone smell from the liquid cooling and fans.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Egan

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Durability is very low. For years i tried Corsair products... mouse... psu and now the Corsair one. Im disappointed and i would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: JCP-Abu Dhabi

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Lightning Fast
customer_reviews.text: Love it Looks amazing and much quieter then I expected. The things is lightning fast, using it for VR and it works like a dream. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect form factor. Perfect performance. Perfect for those who do not want to fiddle with iTX/mATX system.
customer_reviews.author: Chia-Hung Lin

customer_reviews.title: a smooth pc
customer_reviews.text: A very good computer , excellent build quality well done to everyone at Corsair . It handled Rise of the Tomb Raider at maximum settings with a average of 97fps on a UWQHD (Ultra-Wide Quad HD) 3440×1440. monitor .It runs my hyper V home labs with no issues. Thanks to Amazon for the quick service in purchase and delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Sonixdre

customer_reviews.title: Great performance and great gaming experience
customer_reviews.text: This PC is blazing fast. Starting windows takes 10 seconds. Games run smoothly at high settings. The price is right for the specs. I highly recommend this gaming PC.
customer_reviews.author: Ibrahim Al-Saifi

customer_reviews.title: It is just great.. The cooling system is excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I bought a pre-configured gaming PC. It is just great.. The cooling system is excellent! I can never imagine any overheat problem with this setup and also I put my PC on my desk, but I am not hearing any fan sound while playing Witcher 3 with best graphic settings. And very smooth for every game I plays with highest settings. And the look is really smart in a small form factor. I'm glad I bought it! The only thing I would worry about is, I hope Corsair can provide a local in-warranty service to upgrade the hardware inside without shipping the machine around the world, as I live far from US.
customer_reviews.author: Pluto

customer_reviews.title: Everything I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This pc runs cool and quiet no matter what game I’m playing. Compact size is also convenient for my smaller desk area setup.
customer_reviews.author: Rosco Todd

customer_reviews.title: Hard to service
customer_reviews.text: It was a good cpu until the motherboard died. It’s built too small for a local shop to replace it. It has to be sent to manufacturer for repair. Also had some issues with the scratch disks filling up fast.
customer_reviews.author: J. Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically looks beautiful, it is half the size of a regular ...
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically looks beautiful, it is half the size of a regular desktop with 1080ti worth of power. Best purchase I’ve made. Only con is there wasn’t an option for 64 gb ram and I don’t want to open the case and void the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Dexin zheng

customer_reviews.title: I've had this computer for 6 or 7 months and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this computer for 6 or 7 months and have had several problems with it. Usually tech support has been helpful, but I've discovered that the 24/7 technical support they promise doesn't exist. They do not work on weekends and apparently don't work late into the night either. I've been waiting for 2 days for a response for a driver that I need. They don't have the driver on their website. Very aggravating.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Kissinger

customer_reviews.title: Corsair did a terrific job creating my new baby
customer_reviews.text: First time I didn't have to build my own computer. Corsair did a terrific job creating my new baby... It's small. . . very quiet. . . and powerful. . . Just like a Ninja!!!
customer_reviews.author: Newy

customer_reviews.title: Absolute power house in a compact frame.
customer_reviews.text: After looking for what feels like forever I found this computer to be a dream come true. It crushes anything I throw at it. On the specs the power supply is a little small but I've not had any issue with that.
customer_reviews.author: sikwitit

customer_reviews.title: Did not even last three years.
customer_reviews.text: Updating as of December 2019. My Corsair One is completely bricked. The unit crashed during gaming one day (full screen lockup and crash to black screen) and now will not even boot to BIOS. Buyer Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Miller L Ite

customer_reviews.title: This computer is probably one of my favorite pre built options
customer_reviews.text: This computer is probably one of my favorite pre built options. Been almost a year and I am honestly very satisfied with my purchase with the computer being very quiet and and easy to move compare to my full tower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Out of the box NOT FUNCTIONING
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing the unit, I read so many negative reviews and I was thinking, maybe its one problem from one customer. I bought one and when I finally unboxed it and run it for the first time, The main fan on top is not working... it's motor is somehow stuck from the inside... I regret paying 3k on this computer and I urge corsair to stop selling their product until they TEST IT! I am truly disappointed as I needed a compact machine asap but instead I got this malfunctioning machine..
customer_reviews.author: Leopard

customer_reviews.title: Stays very cool and is easily overclocked
customer_reviews.text: Expensive. However, you get what you pay for. Extremely well engineered! Stays very cool and is easily overclocked.
customer_reviews.author: Bone Doctor

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I haven't had a computer as nice as this one. Once you get one you will be addicted to looking at it and feeling it, because it's such high quality. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Grant

customer_reviews.title: Awesome computer
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this computer. The weird thing is it wasn’t in English at first so that was odd to me but got it fixed. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Ladsten

customer_reviews.title: It's surprisingly small
customer_reviews.text: Very compact and quiet. Performance so far has been excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Nesbit

customer_reviews.title: Powerful PC
customer_reviews.text: Amazing machine. Handles all my games great. No issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent PC with some hiccups
customer_reviews.text: Overall not bad, my first unit had problems with the GPU/CPU so I had to ask for a replacement. So far, the replacement is perfect, running games like AC:Origins on 60-80 fps everything maxed out. Now that's what I call worth
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I am not happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Not good for streaming video games at all. Your stream will look good but your game performance will take a hit or vice versa. Absolutely no solutions online i have searched for two years.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Pineda

customer_reviews.title: I can game on the best settings with third party programs running
customer_reviews.text: Really smooth clean and fast. Performs to expectations...I can run 3d modeling programs and all my adobe programs when working and it runs amazingly smooth with multiple windows up....I can game on the best settings with third party programs running, reshades up and live streaming without worries while listening to live radio or podcast...its been worth it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: amazing machine. i get pure joy every time i ...
customer_reviews.text: amazing machine. i get pure joy every time i boot this system up -- no issues. . runs overwatch like a boss. need to play some other games haha. my only complaint is that Corsair should include a mechanical keyboard with this system for the price thanks Corsair for a great quiet PC
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: Great computer very pleased with this purchase and would recommend it to anyone interested in a solid gaming experience and small footprint pc
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bottle rocket blowout. :(
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled when the small box arrived - even smaller than I imagined. Then inside was the computer, a power cable, and the antennas - minimalist, wonderful. Then after booting up (so quickly, wonderful) the Corsair proceeded to download some windows updates and then what - dead. Wouldn't boot, wouldn't do anything. Very disappointed to have to send this back, hopefully the replacement actually works because I have high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: Smatty

customer_reviews.title: but it feels like what Apple would do if they entered the gaming ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a weird comparison, but it feels like what Apple would do if they entered the gaming PC market. Very high performance in a nice package. Well constructed, almost noiseless, even in game. WAF is as good as it gets. You pay a premium for the quality, as you would for a Mac.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: This computer is awful, the support team for it is awful, I believe I purchased. Faulty unit, it has a plethora of problems, I report it to corsair, haven't heard from them in months, and now it's been to long to request a refund from Amazon and I'm stuck with a 2300$ brick that starts when it wants for only a few mins then shuts down and freezes, restarts and the whole process of inability to run happens all over, it wouldn't be that bad IF corsair was better with reading their tickets and resolving issues, you can build a better computer for WAY cheaper that runs 100 times better
customer_reviews.author: Ezkeel

customer_reviews.title: ... first time I buy a corsair product and I'm disappointed, the video card drive keeps rebooting for the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's the first time I buy a corsair product and I'm disappointed, the video card drive keeps rebooting for the first 10mins of turn it on and I have tried eventing including restore the drive for more then 3 times it is still not working, and it ends up might be a video card hardware problem. And the corsair costumer serves is poor even they have a separate department for this pc, but to be clear the build quality is nice. Hopefully the product will be more reliable in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Qin

customer_reviews.title: Good computer but the "upgradability" they advertise is false
customer_reviews.text: Good computer but the "upgradability" they advertise is false. If you try and swap anything out it voids the warranty. Even draining the liquid for a flight would do so which really limits the usage of this machine for myself. Beautifully made and constructed otherwise, the machine ran extremely well the whole time I had it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Dixon

customer_reviews.title: This is not silent.
customer_reviews.text: All in all this is an average PC. I paid a premium to have a small form unit that was marketed as silent. I can hear the fans rattling during idle which was has always been a pet peeve. I am not willing to open anything as I do not want to void the warranty and I am definitely not going through the hassle of sending this back.
customer_reviews.author: Fess

customer_reviews.title: Crashes 24/7 - No Thanks for $3K
customer_reviews.text: Started off ok, was fast and quiet as expected. Then began crashing non-stop costing me multiple D3 Hardcore characters. Tried to patch windows, update drivers, etc - nothing worked. Returning for a refund. Not worth the headache, I bought it to “just work” and it’s done everything but. My personal build from 2007 hasn’t crashed this much in 10 years. I guess I learned my lesson going prebuilt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Performed VERY well for about 2 days and then something smelled like it started smoking inside so I turned it off ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how I feel about this thing. It was so quiet, looked badass!!! Performed VERY well for about 2 days and then something smelled like it started smoking inside so I turned it off and unplugged everything, Well she never came back on after verifying good cable and power. Dead in 2 days. :(
customer_reviews.author: Meeks

customer_reviews.title: The system is awesome from the OS to the outlook
customer_reviews.text: The system is awesome from the OS to the outlook. It's cool! The only 'drawback' maybe I need time to get used to Windows 10 since I have a MacBook before.
customer_reviews.author: Yaojie Xu

product_meta.title: CORSAIR ONE PRO Compact Gaming Desktop PC, Intel Core i7-8700K, GTX 1080, 480GB M.2 SSD, 2TB HDD, 16GB DDR4, VR-Ready
feature_bullets: Six Cores in ONE: Experience the power of a liquid‐cooled Intel Core i7‐8700K CPU. With six cores, twelve threads and running at up to 4.7GHz, it delivers blazing fast gaming performance
Fast, Quiet, Compact: CORSAIR ONE PRO takes fast, quiet and small PCs to a previously impossible level with fully custom liquid cooling technology and an incredibly compact form factor
NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 Graphics: Equipped with a liquid‐cooled NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 graphics card with 8GB of GDDR5X memory, for super‐smooth 4K, VR, gaming and streaming experiences
Fully‐Loaded Memory: Fitted with 16GB of award‐winning CORSAIR VENGEANCE LPX DDR4 memory running at 2,666MHz, for peak performance in today's most demanding games and applications
Storage to Spare: A high‐speed 480GB M.2 SSD and 2TB hard disk drive mean no compromises on performance, or capacity

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars8 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
